channel.title: CVE Feed for UnitedThemes -- Brooklyn | Creative Multi-Purpose Responsive WordPress Theme
channel.description: The latest CVEs for UnitedThemes -- Brooklyn | Creative Multi-Purpose Responsive WordPress Theme

item.title: CVE-2024-24927|2024-02-12T06:07:09.243Z -- unitedthemes -- brooklyn%20%7C%20creative%20multi-purpose%20responsive%20wordpress%20theme
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in UnitedThemes Brooklyn | Creative Multi-Purpose Responsive WordPress Theme allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Brooklyn | Creative Multi-Purpose Responsive WordPress Theme: from n/a through 4.9.7.6.
